comments.body:
A little surprised to see forward-porting release notes from one branch into the next like this.

I think this would make sense as a logically separate commit.
I thought about it, but the 1.14.5 notes were so small I figured to slip them in here. The oddity was the timing, I probably should have waited another day for the branch.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@==========================
NumPy 1.14.5 Release Notes
==========================

This is a bugfix release for bugs reported following the 1.14.4 release. The
